channel.title: Comments on: The Archmage Tours the World (of Warcraft)

item.title: By: Oz
item.dc:creator: Oz
item.description: You can keep the staff from lighting the torches in Blasted Lands too...using it gives you unarmed skillups. Entertaining to have a very long duel with HUGE flaming staves.
item.content:encoded: You can keep the staff from lighting the torches in Blasted Lands too…using it gives you unarmed skillups. Entertaining to have a very long duel with HUGE flaming staves.

item.title: By: celerie
item.dc:creator: celerie
item.description: i still have it. i still have EVERYTHING.
item.content:encoded: i still have it. i still have EVERYTHING.

item.title: By: Flat
item.dc:creator: Flat
item.description: There is a rogue on my server that has macro'd his Vanish so that while he disappears, Vargoth takes his place.
item.content:encoded: There is a rogue on my server that has macro’d his Vanish so that while he disappears, Vargoth takes his place.

item.title: By: yunk
item.dc:creator: yunk
item.description: I once was mind visioning to see who was defending a tower in Eye of the storm, and saw him and told the raid "only 2 at DR, hunter and mage" before I realized it was Vargoth. He was defending the Draeni Ruins! He is everywhere.
item.content:encoded: I once was mind visioning to see who was defending a tower in Eye of the storm, and saw him and told the raid “only 2 at DR, hunter and mage” before I realized it was Vargoth. He was defending the Draeni Ruins! He is everywhere.

item.title: By: Mike
item.dc:creator: Mike
item.description: The guy even has its own website, <a href="http://vargoth.blogspot.com/" rel="nofollow">http://vargoth.blogspot.com/</a>
item.content:encoded: The guy even has its own website, http://vargoth.blogspot.com/

item.title: By: q
item.dc:creator: q
item.description:
To think i've destroyed the staff after completing the quest.
I will never be able to forgive myself.
item.content:encoded:
To think i’ve destroyed the staff after completing the quest.

I will never be able to forgive myself.

item.title: By: johnnyxel
item.dc:creator: johnnyxel
item.description: The best part about that guy is that if you dance with his image, he giggles at you. It's the little things...
item.content:encoded: The best part about that guy is that if you dance with his image, he giggles at you. It’s the little things…
